info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 1:29PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pitkin County through 200 PM MDT... At 129 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Carbondale, or 14 miles south of Glenwood Springs. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Pitkin County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
